data.message: I cannot add my code I chose a location then it just keeps loading page

replies.message: Hi Tania, we're sorry to hear this. We'd recommend clearing the cookies on your browser before trying to enter again. If you need any more help please call us on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1) to hep you troubleshoot. Thanks
Tried to enter a code for the last 45 mins. Given up as nowhere to put in code. My number is CDJ3KN0RQ5. Have i won?

Hi Terry, we're sorry to hear this. If you're a bit stuck please check out our how to guide: http://spr.ly/61818UtbR code allows you to be entered into a daily draw for a chance to win a holiday. Thanks
Thank you but this not connecting. I wont bothet anymore
Hi Terry, we're sorry to hear this. Could you give us a call on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1), Monday - Friday, 9am - 6pm, so we can help you troubleshoot. Thanks
